title: The Fall of the House of Usher (restored, colorized) (1928, horror, imdb score: 7.3)

sources.title: The Fall of the House of Usher (restored, colorized) (1928, horror, imdb score: 7.3)
sources.description: The Fall of the House of Usher (French: La chute de la maison Usher ) is a 1928 French horror film directed by Jean Epstein, one of several films based on the 1839 Gothic short story The Fall of the House of Usher by Edgar Allan Poe.
